page.title: 04TRANSPROT AND INDUSTRY
page.content: Normanton is located at junction 31 of the M62 motorway,which is a favourable location for fast journeys to Leeds,Manchester,Hull and Liverpool. A new industrial estate was established at the east side of Normanton by the local council. The site adjacent to the motorway provides a transport network which links up the whole country.As an inducement to new industry the local council built factory units for rent at low rates and this has resulted in the industrial estate continuing to grow and attracting many well_known manufacturers and services Eg.Halifax building society.Nestles.Asda produce.Burtons biscuits.Dunlop and slazenger sports wear. National Panasonic.Continental pressings.Benson Controls.Swift transport.Hewlett Packard.
